title: (x) Lula magazine logo connected upright script - Kursivschrift {Marc O}
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150328232549im_/http:/typophile.com/files/lula_4014.png)

hi everybody,

can anyone help me identify this font? much appreciated!

p.s. i am glad typophile is back online! you all never cease to impress : )
author: conflagrated

comments.content:
A tightly kerned and lightly modified Kursivschrift

[http://www.fontshop.com/search/?q=kursivschrift&site=d&btnG=Go](http://web.archive.org/web/20150328232549/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=kursivschrift&site=d&btnG=Go "http://www.fontshop.com/search/?q=kursivschrift&site=d&btnG=Go")

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150328232549im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Lula_font_4702.png)

bingo! thank you marcox!!! that took less than ten minutes : )

(and i was still on page 4 out of 15 of myfonts "script fonts" with 96 fonts per page....)

[http://www.myfonts.com/browse/category/myfonts/script/?page=4](http://web.archive.org/web/20150328232549/http:/www.myfonts.com/browse/category/myfonts/script/?page=4 "http://www.myfonts.com/browse/category/myfonts/script/?page=4")
You're welcome. Ten minutes is slow around here... ;)
i know, you guys are amazing :)

Next time maybe do a search if you know what you're looking for. A search for "Lula" came up with [this](http://web.archive.org/web/20150328232549/http:/www.typophile.com/node/31374) and [this thread](http://web.archive.org/web/20150328232549/http:/www.typophile.com/node/34457). Then you even wouldn't have had to wait almost ten minutes. ;^)

ay, how embarrassing, sorry!

you know, i think it crossed my mind to do a search first, but then i forgot (thinking that it was unlikely perhaps). i have learned my lesson.

it seems the Lula magazine font is a big hit!

(maybe i should be worried...)

: )

no, wait! i am vindicated (partially). i \*did\* do a search. seems i just don't know how to do a search? i remember now. i had typed in "lula' in the search box in the upper right, and got only this one thread, about a restaurant in chicago.

hmm. i think i better figure out how to use the search function on this website....

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150328232549im_/http:/typophile.com/files/lula_chicago_6690.png)

The Typophile search is kinda unreliable. :^/

[Here ya go.](http://web.archive.org/web/20150328232549/http:/typophile.com/node/35491)
Drag one of these into your bookmark bar and you'll have a Typophile Search at your fingertips at all times.
thanks miss tiffany i didn't know about that google search function, it works amazingly! : )
